CHAPTER 276 Park and Recreation Board

276.01Establishment.

276.02Employees; compensation.

CROSS REFERENCES

General provisions - see CHTR. Sec. 9.11

Parks and recreation - see Ohio R.C. Ch. 755; S. U. & P.S. Ch. 1060

Department of Community Programs - see ADM. Ch. 246

Park Committee - see ADM. 220.01 (Rule 11)

Building permit fees for parks - see P. & Z. 1262.27

Parks in planned unit developments - see P. & Z. 1272.04
